title: My account was hacked and now I'm banned
body: Hey Riot. I haven't played in a year. I tried logging in today and it says my account was banned. It said to check my email for notification. Well there was no notice. So I logged in here to see if I could find something. When I went to manage account I noticed a very strange email address associated with my account. I believe my account was hacked and whoever was playing my account got me banned somehow. I put a lot of time into this and would like this account back. Anything I can do?

replies.body: Not to worry yet! I went ahead and looked over this account as well, and it does look like some suspicious activity was noticed. There's some relatively strong evidence that someone was able to hack your account, just like you suspected, so go ahead and reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Once they can verify that you were the creator of this account, they'll be able to work with you and get you back in the game!
